metadata.Title: CVE-2016-2091 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The dwarf_read_cie_fde_prefix function in dwarf_frame2.c in libdwarf 20151114 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read) via a crafted ELF object file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-2091` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

dwarfdump - 20120410-2+deb7u2build0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dwarfutils package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '20120410-2+deb7u2build0.14.04.1').
